exercises.name: Push-ups

male: Start in plank position with hands shoulder-width apart
Lower your body until chest nearly touches the floor
Push back up to starting position
female: Start in plank position or modified knee position
Lower your body until chest nearly touches the floor
Push back up to starting position
Keep core engaged and back straight

exercises.tips: Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels
exercises.video_description: Full body push-up demonstration with proper form

exercises.name: Squats

male: Lower down as if sitting in a chair
female: Lower down keeping weight in heels
Keep chest up and core engaged

exercises.tips: Keep your chest up and avoid letting knees cave inward
exercises.video_description: Perfect squat form with depth and alignment cues

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.tips: Don't let hips sag or pike up too high
exercises.video_description: Static plank hold with proper alignment

exercises.name: Lunges

female: Lower into lunge keeping torso upright
Push through front heel to return

exercises.tips: Keep most of your weight on your front leg
exercises.video_description: Forward lunges with proper knee alignment

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.tips: Keep your hips at the same level throughout the movement
exercises.video_description: Dynamic mountain climbers with cardio intensity

exercises.name: Burpees

female: Step or jump back to plank

exercises.tips: Land softly and maintain control throughout
exercises.video_description: Full burpee sequence with modification options

exercises.name: Dead Bug

male: Lie on back, arms up, knees bent
female: Lie on back with arms extended up
Slowly lower opposite arm and leg

exercises.tips: Keep your lower back pressed into the floor
exercises.video_description: Core stability exercise with limb coordination

exercises.name: Wall Sit
exercises.tips: Distribute weight evenly between both legs
exercises.video_description: Isometric leg strength exercise against wall

exercises.name: Jumping Jacks

male: Start with feet together, arms at sides
Jump feet apart while raising arms
female: Jump feet wide while arms go overhead

exercises.tips: Land softly on the balls of your feet
exercises.video_description: Classic cardio exercise with arm coordination

exercises.name: Glute Bridges

male: Create straight line from knees to shoulders
female: Lie on back with feet flat

exercises.tips: Squeeze your glutes at the top of the movement
exercises.video_description: Hip strengthening exercise with glute activation

exercises.name: High Knees

male: Stand tall, drive knees up high

exercises.tips: Try to bring your knees up to hip level
exercises.video_description: Cardio drill emphasizing knee lift and cadence

exercises.name: Tricep Dips

male: Sit on chair edge, hands beside hips
Push back up to starting position
female: Keep legs bent for easier variation

exercises.tips: Keep your elbows close to your body
exercises.video_description: Upper body strength exercise targeting triceps

exercises.name: Russian Twists

male: Sit with knees bent, lean back slightly
female: Sit with knees bent, core engaged

exercises.tips: Focus on rotating your torso, not just your arms
exercises.video_description: Core rotation exercise for oblique strength

exercises.name: Step-ups

male: Drive through heel to step up

exercises.tips: Use your leg muscles, not momentum to step up
exercises.video_description: Functional leg exercise using step or platform
